head.title: keyframe-declaration-no-important
head.description: keyframe-declaration-no-important Disallow !important within keyframe declarations. Options true The following patterns are considered…

body:
#keyframe-declaration-no-important

Disallow !important within keyframe declarations.

@keyframes important2 {
  from { margin: 10px }
  to { margin: 20px !important }
}                /* ↑ */
/**                 ↑
*     This !important */

#Options

#true

The following patterns are considered warnings:

@keyframes important1 {
  from {
    margin-top: 50px;
  }
  to {
    margin-top: 100px !important;
  }
}
@keyframes important1 {
  from {
    margin-top: 50px;
  }
  to {
    margin-top: 100px!important;
  }
}
@keyframes important1 {
  from {
    margin-top: 50px;
  }
  to {
    margin-top: 100px ! important;
  }
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { color: pink !important; }
@keyframes important1 {
  from {
    margin-top: 50px;
  }
  to {
    margin-top: 100px;
  }
}
